tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ligament_tendon_properties (
  ligament_tendon_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ligament_name VARCHAR(50),
  tendon_name VARCHAR(50),
  elasticity FLOAT,
  tensile_strength FLOAT,
  elongation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ligament_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  ligament_type VARCHAR(50),
  injury_type VARCHAR(50),
  rehabilitation_protocol VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE tendon_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  tendon_type VARCHAR(50),
  injury_type VARCHAR(50),
  rehabilitation_progress VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE rehabilitation_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE injuries (
  injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ligament_id INT,
  tendon_id INT,
  injury_type VARCHAR(50),
  recovery_time INT
);

CREATE TABLE rehabilitation_history (
  rehab_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  rehab_date DATE,
  rehab_duration INT,
  notes TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE ligaments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(255), stiffness FLOAT, elasticity FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE tendons (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(255), strength FLOAT, flexibility FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE injuries (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), affected_part VARCHAR(255), recovery_time INT, treatment VARCHAR(255);
CREATE TABLE rehabilitation_plans (id INT PRIMARY KEY, plan_name VARCHAR(255), duration INT, exercises TEXT, diet_plan TEXT);
CREATE TABLE patient_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(255), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), injury_history TEXT);
